nodes.text: So this door leads back into the Catacombs. It's a short cut to doom.

This is a really sturdy, solid double door. Makes me wonder wonder what's on the other side. There's a small bar sealing the two doors and an old lock. This must have been part of the original castle.
The bar looks like a recent addition - it's metal and unrusted. There are marks on the door that look like runes.
This is a really sturdy, solid double door. Makes me wonder what's on the other side. I've removed the bar, but it's still sealed by an old lock. This must have been part of the original castle.

This is a really sturdy, solid double door. Makes me wonder what's on the other side. I've removed the bar and picked the lock, but it's still sealed - probably by a bar on the other side. This must have been part of the original castle.
This stupid door won't budge.. It still seems to be barred from the other side.
I can't hear anything. The door might be too thick... or it's as silent as death on the other side. That's a scary thought!
This looks like an older version of a Drew class lock. That means I should be able to open this by now.
Well, I can tell it's a lock and it's old, but I clearly fail my 'basic locks identification' check. I guess I need to study more.
Let's see, first I'll unbar the door, then I'll unlock it.
Darn. It looks like it's barred on the other side as well as this side. I'm not getting through this way.
No dice. Maybe one day I'll be able to open this lock.
I'd need to find a lockpick first.
There are magical runes on this door... protective magic against Undead and hostile magic. I'll bet they were placed there by Prof. Silvia.
I can easily open this door in debug mode!
